text: The National symbols of the Solomon Islands are the symbols that are used to represent both the divided Solomon Islander people proper and abroad to represent the country and its people. ==Solomon Islander symbols== Symbol Image Coat of arms Coat of arms of the Solomon Islands Flag Flag of the Solomon Islands Flower National flower of the Solomon Islands Hibiscus tiliaceus Tree National tree of the Solomon Islands Metroxylon salomonense Birds National bird of the Solomon Islands Ducula pacifica Solomon national bird Columba vitiensis Animal National animal of the Solomon Islands Eretmochelys imbricata bissa Predators National shark of the Solomon Islands Galeocerdo cuvier National reptile of the Solomon Islands Crocodylus porosus
title: National symbols of the Solomon Islands
